<< Suukie took all of the shots and then stared at Stinkbomb coldly.....then 
he
 walked away, going back into the Ark, but not to get help... >>

Errr...Unless Suukie is super armored, that is the biggest piece of moding 
I've ever seen.  This is a heavy laser rifle (for reference, look at 
"Aftermath", which was after the Other Voices parts, in that western-like 
fight between Maxis and Preds).  At point blank range, that gun would've 
blown a frickin' hole in Suukie's GUT!  I urge you to repost that Code.  The 
weapon has a power pack, it doesn't depend on the power of Stinkbomb's 
energy.
